Reviews.Title: “Trekking across Italy...”
Reviews.Author: garnet8
Reviews.Content: cute little alleys bridges upset bit hard time finding hotel finally piazza ok complaint serious stairs reception gentleman manning desk wonderful help nice inviting clean bathroom nice size location perfect walked walking tour gondola ride fabulous food people nice enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Small and discreet”
Reviews.Author: cjpvision
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights janfeb 2012 hidden short walk st marks square hence excellent location adequate ensuite shower decor bit quirky dark maybe thats venetian style continental breakfast fine staff polite helpful beware 2 flights stairs tiny doorway negotiate hotel

Reviews.Title: “Quirky, superb location”
Reviews.Author: POHB
Reviews.Content: stayed oct 2011 lovely location near st marks hidden door steep stairs dont cant climb stairs baggage friendly receptionbreakfast manned help simple nice buffet breakfasts bad night water tank noisy night inaudible elsewhere sorted soon told cant blame immaculate bland international hotel hotel type amazing value location course eating nearby hugely expensive thats heart tourist land spa shop 15 mins walk cheaper supplies

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: 4eTraveller
Reviews.Content: hotel nice price location st marks sq little obscure daunting staircase enter quadruple adequate clean staff friendly helpful breakfast nice stayed 3 found previous occupant left samsung phone safe easy phone magnetic found couldnt kindle light ran hand inside safe phone staff front desk

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: luckysam12
Reviews.Content: hotel situated heart venice close st marks square accessed via steep stair suitable disabled visitors staff friendly helpful booked family consisted double bed single beds short stay double wardrobe limited drawer space provided ensuite bathroom walk shower sink toilet reservation direct hotel allowed received discount hotel reasonably priced comparison accommodation venice breakfast consisted cereals bread rolls cheese hams yoghurt fruit croissants etc ample amounts freshly brewed coffee overall trip enjoyable return venice definitely hotel san gallo due location friendliness staff

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: john T
Reviews.Content: 5 minute walk boat tow luggage couple bridges enter hotel door flight stairs looks daunting average shape issue clean tiny breakfast staff friendly helpfull close st marks square hard rock cafe realy quiet

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel/location”
Reviews.Author: cuterosie
Reviews.Content: stayed san gallo nights week time 4 ago start finish san gallo excellent remembered staff pleasant helpful absolutely fine expect venice spotlessly clean location bettered wonderful time return san gallo future

Reviews.Title: “Great location, helpful staff and value for money”
Reviews.Author: jennyg1965
Reviews.Content: hotel little difficult location st marks square easy walking distance vaporetto steep climb stairs reception managed im staff helped wed clean bed comfortable quiet slept except night school staying kids running passages yelling slamming doors 1200 midnight reception sorted complained view window onto wall pigeon woke morning cooing window sill breakfast ok lot worse variety pay computer print boarding passes ready leave staff helpful clock tower tour venice wonderful book online correr museum

Reviews.Title: “Great location if a little noisy!”
Reviews.Author: warrencammack
Reviews.Content: main square perfect base yourself explore venice staff friendly helpful breakfast wasnt bad main night look san gallo square houses theatre thoroughfare people coming home restuarants bars

Reviews.Title: “Great location in need of a total facelift, staff training and exterminator”
Reviews.Author: Nansdrivel
Reviews.Content: hotel san gallo wonderful location especially youre trip venice close st marks feel secluded prepared hike upstairs arrive dont expect warm welcome staff pretend welcome sadly husband motherinlaw eaten alive bugs train staff quality exterminator soon news comfortable breakfast decent cleanup friendlier staff

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Easy to Find”
Reviews.Author: divinefeeling
Reviews.Content: location short walk steps vaporetto stop warned staircase albergo steps depending floor floor quiet except renovations theatre downstairs breakfast selection ok ok average size italian standards pillows rocks location handy vaporetto st marks square etc

Reviews.Title: “great location- tiny room”
Reviews.Author: SaraGood
Reviews.Content: located heart san marco set 6 inches space bed wall stay crowds close dont sucked venice play theater door serious waste money

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel San Gallo
HotelInfo.Address: San Marco 1093/A | Campo San Gallo, 30124 Venice, Italy
